home-time.text: Time cannot be stopped, you can just make the best out of it.

company-banner.choose: Choose who to spend time with because you

company-us.description: is a leading socially responsible company dedicated to the home eco-friendly car washing.

company.p1: Easy Wash is a leading socially responsible company dedicated to the home eco-friendly car washing
company.p2: Our brand is registered in the Mexican Institute of Industrial Property and in process of affiliation to the Mexican Franchise Association
company.p3: It is an innovative and profitable concept that offers a professional car-wash service in the place where you are with products that protect the environment
company.p4: Easy Wash provides you with a quality service creating a unique experience to maximize your time

mission.title: Mission
mission.text:
We transform the home car wash service, offering a dynamic and one-of-a-kind treatment, 
 able to change the way of thinking of the customer, and creating a social and ecological impact

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: We are a home car wash service company offering a one-of-a-kind treatment and creating a social and ecological impact.

philosophy.title: We are a company dedicated to add value to your time
philosophy.p1:
We specialize on the home car wash service creating a one-of-a-kind service. 

With our work philosophy of caring and attending the slightest detail, we have managed to be different as a professional company
philosophy.important: committed to society and the environment
philosophy.p2: We create a friendly relationship with our business partners and clients since all of them are important pillars of the growth of Easy Wash
philosophy.img-title: Our best business is your complete satisfaction

point-map.title: Service Points
point-map.p1: Since the establishment of Easy Wash in 2014 we have had an exponential growth, thanks to the successful business model we use.
point-map.important: In Mexico, we already have franchises operating, and we have coming opening in the USA.
point-map.p2: These are the cities where the franchise is located.

banner.title: Take your time
banner.text:
To dream, discover, enjoy
invite, laugh, taste, imagine
feel, live . . .

franchise-banner.title: Why to invest in a franchise?
franchise-banner.text: The industry of the franchises has grown four times more that the national economy, according to data from the Mexican Franchise Association (AMF).

franchise.p1: The possibilities of success place at a 95%, compared to the 83% of the guided incubators and the 23% of a company that starts independently, according to the Ministry of Economy.
franchise.p3: The 90% of the franchises survives after five years of operation, while the 60% of the traditional businesses fail after two years of being open.
franchise.p2: In Easy Wash we hope to count with people like you to be part of the Easy Wash franchise Family. Leave us your information and we will contact you shortly to provide with more information about us.
